God’s Sovereign Choice (Genesis 25:19–28; Malachi 1:1–5)

\w It|strong="G3754"\w* \w is|strong="G3588"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w as|strong="G1161"\w* \w though|strong="G1161"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*’s \w word|strong="G3056"\w* \w has|strong="G2316"\w* \w failed|strong="G3756"\w*. \w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w who|strong="G3588"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* descended \w from|strong="G1537"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w* \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w Israel|strong="G2474"\w*.
